body:
Please remove the map portal on nexus. 

1. The portals doesn't work.
2. You aren't getting any golden apples when you're killing someone.
3. The map is laggy - Too much glowstone.

Thanks for reading!

- Have an awesome day/night
- Adam

replies.body:
We have removed the map Portal from rotations, thank you for your input.
I was aware of the fps drop caused by glowstone, and I was actually wondering if it would be okay to remove that map from rotations, anyways, I wasn't aware of portals not working properly and golden apples not dropping, so being a buggy map overall caused its removal.
